data.comment: The match has started.
Santos Laguna to take a throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente territory.
In the minute 3, Corner awarded to Santos Laguna.
Ball safe as Santos Laguna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Tijuana de Caliente awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 6, Tijuana de Caliente needs to be cautious. Santos Laguna have an attacking throw-in.
Diego Montano Robles awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente at Estadio TSM Corona.
In the minute 8, Diego Montano Robles signals a Tijuana de Caliente throw-in in Santos Laguna's half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente close to the penalty box.
Throw-in Santos Laguna.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Santos Laguna awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Tijuana de Caliente at Estadio TSM Corona.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente at Estadio TSM Corona.
Diego Montano Robles awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick Santos Laguna.
In the minute 16, Santos Laguna have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
Santos Laguna are coming forward and Fernando Gorriaran gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Torreon.
In the minute 17, Santos Laguna's Octavio Rivero gets in a shot on goal at Estadio TSM Corona. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Santos Laguna have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 18, Throw-in Santos Laguna.
Santos Laguna are pushing forward but Octavio Rivero's finish is wide of the goal.
Diego Montano Robles awards Tijuana de Caliente a goal kick.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Santos Laguna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Santos Laguna capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Tijuana de Caliente's half?
In the minute 22, Throw-in high up the field for Santos Laguna in Torreon.
Doria (Santos Laguna) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Goal! Santos Laguna have got their heads in front thanks to a Walter Sandoval strike.
In the minute 23, Julio Furch with an assist there.
Can Tijuana de Caliente get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos Laguna's half?
Ball safe as Santos Laguna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 25, Santos Laguna's Fernando Gorriaran misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Tijuana de Caliente goal kick.
Tijuana de Caliente have a goal kick.
In the minute 29, Diego Montano Robles awards Santos Laguna a goal kick.
Free kick in a good position for Santos Laguna!
In Torreon, Jose van Rankin (Santos Laguna) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 31, Corner awarded to Santos Laguna.
Santos Laguna push upfield but Diego Montano Robles quickly pulls them for offside.
Ball safe as Santos Laguna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 34, Ball goes out of play for a Tijuana de Caliente goal kick.
Throw-in Tijuana de Caliente.
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Santos Laguna.
In the minute 36, Diego Montano Robles signals a throw-in for Santos Laguna, close to Tijuana de Caliente's area.
Goal! Vladimir Lorona extends Santos Laguna's lead to 2-0.
Julio Furch instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 37, Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Santos Laguna in their own half.
Free kick for Santos Laguna in the half of Tijuana de Caliente.
In the minute 41, Santos Laguna have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
In Torreon, Hugo Rodriguez (Santos Laguna) misses the target with a header.
Tijuana de Caliente have a goal kick.
In the minute 41, Tijuana de Caliente awarded a free kick in their own half.
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Santos Laguna in their own half.
In Torreon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente in the half of Santos Laguna.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is underway at Estadio TSM Corona.
In the minute 46, David Barbona is replacing Christian Rivera for Tijuana de Caliente at Estadio TSM Corona.
The away team have replaced Fabian Castillo with Jordan Rezabala. This is the second substitution made today by Pablo Guede.
Corner awarded to Santos Laguna.
In the minute 47, Santos Laguna attack but Hugo Rodriguez's header doesn't find the target.
Goal kick for Tijuana de Caliente at Estadio TSM Corona.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna close to the penalty box.
In the minute 48, Play has been interrupted briefly in Torreon to check on David Andrade, who is grimacing with pain.
Diego Montano Robles awards the home team a throw-in.
David Andrade for Santos Laguna is back on the field again.
In the minute 50, Tijuana de Caliente awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Torreon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Diego Montano Robles signals a Santos Laguna throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente's half.
In the minute 53, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Santos Laguna have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Santos Laguna in their own half.
In the minute 54, Vladimir Lorona (Tijuana de Caliente) gets a yellow card.
Free kick Santos Laguna.
Santos Laguna to take a throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente territory.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Santos Laguna at Estadio TSM Corona.
Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
In the minute 58, Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in the half of Santos Laguna.
Can Tijuana de Caliente capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Santos Laguna's half?
Santos Laguna are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 61, It's a goal kick for the away team in Torreon.
Tijuana de Caliente awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Pablo Guede (Tijuana de Caliente) is making a third substitution, with Clifford Aboagye replacing Luis Leal.
In the minute 62, Bryan Angulo is on a sub for Edgar Lopez for Tijuana de Caliente.
Free kick for Santos Laguna in their own half.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna at Estadio TSM Corona.
In the minute 64, Goal kick for Santos Laguna at Estadio TSM Corona.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Torreon.
Jorge Guillermo Almada is making the team's first substitution at Estadio TSM Corona with Adrian Lozano replacing Walter Sandoval.
In the minute 66, Can Santos Laguna get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente's half?
Diego Montano Robles awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Tijuana de Caliente is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 68, Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente.
Bryan Angulo (Tijuana de Caliente) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Santos Laguna's Adrian Lozano is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 69, Ball goes out of play for a Tijuana de Caliente goal kick.
David Barbona of Tijuana de Caliente gets in a strike, but is off target.
Santos Laguna have a goal kick.
In the minute 71, The home team have replaced Bryan Garnica with Carlos Orrantia. This is the second substitution made today by Jorge Guillermo Almada.
Mauro Lainez for the away team is judged to be offside.
Jorge Guillermo Almada (Santos Laguna) is making a third substitution, with Eduardo Aguirre replacing Octavio Rivero.
In Torreon Santos Laguna drive forward through Adrian Lozano. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 75, Pablo Guede is making the team's fifth substitution at Estadio TSM Corona with Jordi Cortizo replacing Aldo Cruz.
Diego Montano Robles awards Tijuana de Caliente a goal kick.
In the minute 78, Goal kick for Tijuana de Caliente at Estadio TSM Corona.
Santos Laguna will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Tijuana de Caliente.
Santos Laguna have a goal kick.
In the minute 81, Santos Laguna are coming forward and David Andrade gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Diego Montano Robles awards Tijuana de Caliente a goal kick.
At Estadio TSM Corona, Tijuana de Caliente are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 83, Important block from the Tijuana de Caliente defence as Eduardo Aguirre fires in a strike for Santos Laguna.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Torreon.
Tijuana de Caliente's Bryan Angulo breaks free at Estadio TSM Corona. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 85, Throw-in Santos Laguna.
Santos Laguna awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Tijuana de Caliente goal kick.
In the minute 86, In Torreon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Doria gets his shot on target but fails to score for Santos Laguna.
Santos Laguna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 89, Throw-in for Santos Laguna in the half of Tijuana de Caliente.
Ball safe as Santos Laguna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
David Andrade for Santos Laguna drives towards goal at Estadio TSM Corona. But the finish is unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Santos Laguna to take a throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente territory.
Corner awarded to Santos Laguna.
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Diego Montano Robles blows to end the match. The final score is 2-0.
